metadata.name: LotusLanguage#02
metadata.description: The "Lotus Language paintings" are a series of 100 lotus-themed works created by the famous Chinese-American painter Mr. Changming Meng in the past seven years. Inspired by the lotus in four different seasons, Mr. Meng use a variety of expressive methods to show his love for the life and use brushes to illustrate the spiritual connotation of beauty from different aspects. Eight works were selected from a hundred of works to form the NFT of "Lotus Language", which is another highlight of Mr Meng's virtual art after "Genesis bull". The "Lotus Language" NFTs and its original paintings can be regarded as one single unity and can also be regarded as two aspects of one.
